short_summary: Canadian Government Requests Bidder Proposals for Hose Assembly, Air Duct Supplies.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 

* **Project Title: Hose Assembly, Air Duct**
* **Print Number (NPN):** **cb-8633-83492410**
* **Amendment Number:** **5**
* **Solicitation Reference:** **W8485-247816/A**

### Tender Details 

* **Closing Date:** **2023-10-03T14:00:00**
* **Publication Date:** **2023-08-30**
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** **2023-12-18**
* **Expected Contract End Date:** **2024-03-31**
* **Procurement Method:** **Competitive - Open bidding** (Selection based on lowest price)
* **Procurement Category:** **Government of Canada**

### Tender Requirements 

We intend to purchase hoses to be delivered to the [25th Canadian Forces Supply Depot, Montreal] by October 2023. The item description is as follows:

Hose Assembly, Air Duct (GSIN: 4720, NSN: 4720-01-552-6521)

The specifications include:

*   Item grouping: Hoses and Fittings
*   Part No.: 1000895-540
*   Quantity: 10
*   Unit of Issue: EA
*   Unit Name: Air Duct
*   Packaging Details: (Specify according to NSN)   

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents can be submitted in English or French.

### Contact Information 

To obtain further information, please contact:

Audreé Poissant-Viau
Email: audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
Phone: 00-unused                      

### Official Documents 

Details of the bid solicitation are available online through the [Canada Buy website](https://www.canadabuys.ca) under the following links: 

* [Bid Solicitation (PDF)](https://canadabuys.ca/file/1234)
* [Bid Solicitation (French PDF)](https://canadabuys.ca/file/1235)

The tender is no longer active as the closing date has passed. There is no opportunity for offers or negotiations on this procurement. Consider Twitter to find more Canada Government Tenders.
